page.title: 19LOCAL AFFAIRS CONT...
page.content: the subject of heated debates in the council chamber are the questions of where to position the jubilee fountain and how to improve the public lavatories in the market place.It is said that these have deterred tourists and that they give a bad impression to visitors. Next year the city celebrates its 1100th birthday,and the local people have been preparing for this historic event.The main sports clubs have organised matches against teams of international standard at Rugby, cricket and soccer.The Cathedral will be the scene of plays and concerts. Fountains Abbey will again be the scene of medieval"revels",similar to those held in 1886 during the millenary celebrations.
